languages.text: {n}По залу пробегает шепот, перерастающий в гул одобрения. Никто не смеет перечить новому единоличному судье Простора Коронус.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
Если играет этюд VP_SolomonTraitorDead или VP_SolomonTraitorAlive
VC_SolomonTraitorExile
Стартуер этюд VP_RTJustice

languages.text: {n}A whisper runs through the room, turning slowly into a murmur of approval. No one dares resist the will of the newly proclaimed sole judge of the Koronus Expanse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}По залу пробегает шепот, перерастающий в гул одобрения. Никто не смеет перечить новому единоличному судье Простора Коронус.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein Flüstern hallt durch den Saal, das langsam in ein anerkennendes Raunen übergeht. Niemand wagt es, sich dem Willen {mf|des nun alleinigen Richters|der nun alleinigen Richterin} der Koronus-Ausdehnung zu widersetzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A whisper runs through the room, turning slowly into a murmur of approval. No one dares resist the will of the newly proclaimed sole judge of the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Flüstern hallt durch den Saal, das langsam in ein anerkennendes Raunen übergeht. Niemand wagt es, sich dem Willen {mf|des nun alleinigen Richters|der nun alleinigen Richterin} der Koronus-Ausdehnung zu widersetzen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un chuchotement parcourt la salle en se transformant peu à peu en murmure d'approbation. Personne n'ose s'opposer à la volonté {mf|du seul|de la seule} et unique juge des Étendues de Koronus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A whisper runs through the room, turning slowly into a murmur of approval. No one dares resist the will of the newly proclaimed sole judge of the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un chuchotement parcourt la salle en se transformant peu à peu en murmure d'approbation. Personne n'ose s'opposer à la volonté {mf|du seul|de la seule} et unique juge des Étendues de Koronus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}窃窃私语声传遍了整个房间，随后慢慢变成了赞同的低语声。无人胆敢反对科罗努斯扩区唯一的仲裁者。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A whisper runs through the room, turning slowly into a murmur of approval. No one dares resist the will of the newly proclaimed sole judge of the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}窃窃私语声传遍了整个房间，随后慢慢变成了赞同的低语声。无人胆敢反对科罗努斯扩区唯一的仲裁者。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un susurro recorre la sala, convirtiéndose lentamente en un murmullo de aprobación. Nadie osa cuestionar la voluntad de{mf|l| la} nuev{mf|o|a} y autoproclamad{mf|o|a} juez{mf||a} únic{mf|o|a} de la Extensión de Koronus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A whisper runs through the room, turning slowly into a murmur of approval. No one dares resist the will of the newly proclaimed sole judge of the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un susurro recorre la sala, convirtiéndose lentamente en un murmullo de aprobación. Nadie osa cuestionar la voluntad de{mf|l| la} nuev{mf|o|a} y autoproclamad{mf|o|a} juez{mf||a} únic{mf|o|a} de la Extensión de Koronus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}小声が部屋を駆け巡り、徐々に賛同のざわめきへと変わっていく。新たにコロヌス・エクスパンスの唯一の裁判官と宣言された者の意思に逆らう者はいない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A whisper runs through the room, turning slowly into a murmur of approval. No one dares resist the will of the newly proclaimed sole judge of the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}小声が部屋を駆け巡り、徐々に賛同のざわめきへと変わっていく。新たにコロヌス・エクスパンスの唯一の裁判官と宣言された者の意思に逆らう者はいない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Odayı bir fısıltı furyası kaplıyor. Fısıltılar yavaş yavaş kararı onaylayan mırıltılara dönüşüyor. Koronus Enginliği'nin henüz ilan edilen yegâne yargıcının iradesine karşı gelmeye kimse cesaret edemiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A whisper runs through the room, turning slowly into a murmur of approval. No one dares resist the will of the newly proclaimed sole judge of the Koronus Expanse.{/n}
